name: Oileach
description:
A whole new meaning to oil leaching...

Try to survive as long as you can with only an oil lantern...

  • Fight out the leeches by shining your light
  • Collect oil before the light burns out
  • SURVIVE!

HOW TO PLAY-

>If the leeches touch the light they will retreat.

>The game is based on simplicity and basic controls, you aren't missing anything.

>The oil will run out after the bar is empty...

>Once the light runs out leeches will chase after you, your blood will drain until you go stale; die. 

CONTROLS -

Movement:


🢁🢀🢃🢂
